Some affected individuals develop skin rashes, likely as a result of an abnormal immune response due to the increased number of eosinophils.",GHR,PDGFRB-associated chronic eosinophilic leukemia
How many people are affected by PDGFRB-associated chronic eosinophilic leukemia ?,"The exact prevalence of PDGFRB-associated chronic eosinophilic leukemia is unk
